description:

One way to make her orgasm is through oral sex. The girls discuss cunnilingus tips, including how to suck and push on her clitoris. The conversation quickly switches to penises and how to give the best blow job while cupping the balls. There answer isn't what you expect. They don't actually want to have sex like a porn star.
